story.text: Jan 3 Cingular said the Western States Contracting Alliance (WSCA) has renewed its contract with the company, providing state and local agencies in 50 states with the ability to purchase Cingular's wireless voice and data services. The new, four-year agreement is expected to generate nearly $2 billion in total revenue for Cingular, the largest U.S. wireless phone carrier. Cingular is solely owned by AT&T Inc. (T.N). (Reporting by Ankur Relia in Bangalore)
story.title: cingular says wsca renews contract , sees $ 2 bln revenue from it
